description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(528).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,46,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[528], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[-(x^3 - 22 x^2 - 23 x - 22)/(x^4 - 46 x^2 + 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 13 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[22, 23, 1034, 1057]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 46*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..25]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 13 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
